name: elm-buzzword-bingo
description: ```bash # command line elm repl                              # interactive repl elm reactor                           # compiler and server elm-make Main.elm                     # compile to HTML in index.html elm-make Main.elm --output main.html  # compile to HTML in main.html elm-make Main.elm --output elm.js     # compile to JS in elm.js elm-make Main.elm --warn              # compile and report warnings ```
